channel.title: Posts on Yunhai Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yunhai Blog

item.title: Story About A
item.description: Alpha (A), our story character got to know about bouldering via one of his non-important friends (he doesn’t even remember his/her name anymore) two years ago, and ever since that he has been bouldering with enormous determination and leveled up quickly among the group of people who started more or less at the same period of time. It is true that there were times when he was not motivated enough, either it was the Dutch gloomy winter, or it was merely low energy.

item.title: A couple of things that I really like to have in my home
item.description: A couple of things that I really like to have in my home I’ve been telling friends around about me buying a flat in Rotterdam, even though there is still a long journey to go before actually having one. But the combined feeling of happiness in visualizing a home and deep trust in my friends made me less discreet. Boom, here it goes, the mortgage applications for the flat have been having some major issues.
